multiplechoiceresponse.label: Which of the following describes epistemic uncertainty?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: Uncertainty in the model itself that can be reduced by adding data
Uncertainty in the input data that cannot be reduced
Uncertainty in the predictions of the model due to randomness
Uncertainty in the model's ability to generalize to unseen data
